system.descriptionText: Comrade in Cohesion distracts target within 3 metres of Character,Character makes Opposed Sleight of Hand Test against target with +30 if target is unaware of them. If Succesful, they may steal one item from the target's person of Size(2, Puny) or Smaller. If getting 3+ Degrees of Success, can immediately afterwards make the Disengage Action as a Free Action.
